name: devsecops-sentinel-v2-warden
description: Warden - Autonomous Security Operations & Compliance Enforcement. ML vulnerability prediction, autonomous remediation engine, multi-framework compliance (SOC2, HIPAA, GDPR, PCI-DSS), supply chain security, and runtime threat response. Provides 18 specialized agents and 25 commands for 71% security FTE reduction.
features: ML Vulnerability Prediction (v2.0) - Pre-emptive vulnerability detection
Autonomous Remediation (v2.0) - Auto-fix vulnerabilities with PR generation
Multi-Framework Compliance (v2.0) - SOC2, HIPAA, GDPR, PCI-DSS, ISO27001
Supply Chain Guardian (v2.0) - Dependency security and SBOM generation
SAST Runner (v2.0) - Semgrep, CodeQL static analysis
DAST Orchestrator (v2.0) - OWASP ZAP, Burp automated scanning
Container Scanner (v2.0) - Trivy, Grype vulnerability detection
IaC Auditor (v2.0) - tfsec, Checkov infrastructure scanning
Secrets Detector (v2.0) - TruffleHog, GitLeaks credential scanning
